p:
Another possible mechanism of panduratin A action might have occurred through its antioxidant activity. This compound itself is a potent reducing agent and can decrease levels of reactive oxygen species (ROS) in vitro
40, 41 . Whether the ROS scavenging mechanism facilitates the attenuation of SARS-CoV-2 infection by panduratin A, similar to that observed in Japanese Encephalitis virus (JEV)
42 , is yet to be deciphered. Further, this anti-oxidative stress might be coupled with anti-inflammatory responses widely reported for panduratin A. For example, panduratin A can reduce the expression of genes whose function is involved in inflammation
43â€“ 46 . Undoubtedly, therapeutic strategies aiming at the modulation of inflammation has been proposed for COVID-19 as a mean to reduce the severity of the disease
47 .
